attributes.action: The UK goverment to immediately help stoppage of the Amazon burning.
attributes.additional_details: The United kingdom should help put a stoppage to the fire as the Amazon helps stabilise the earth's climate and slows global warming by fixing co2 and producing 20% of the world's oxygen. As a country we should try gain multiple support from other nations. Also as  the human race we should all stand together and help our goverment  to stop this world disaster.
attributes.background: The UK goverment should immediately gain support from other world nations. And help stop the Amazon rainforest from burning.
